title: This is just a joke anymore
body: SO  feeders  ,people can go afk  others can not help ,but  dam you if you say anything  for that you are toxic and should be banned .YOu make a game with divisions and challenge us to climb  but yet you stop us everyway you can if you solo Q to move forward but don't ever  say anything to someone that failed.Kids with low self-esteem cant handle it and we want those low self-esteem kids here.You can report anything in this game and most games someone is getting reported .Why don't you see this in other games .You rely on team play here more then most other games but you keep pairing us with that same people that over and over do the same thing  like feed,go afk  and basically help the other team

replies.body:
You aren't justified to retaliate with flame or be toxic, no matter the circumstance(unless you are tyler1) 
the chat and ping are for gameplay.

when you downloaded/Registered, you agreed to the ToS, you also Agreed to the summoners code, and by being toxic and flaming, you broke the code.

lets just say.

read the terms next time.

that doesn't mean the code is infallible. 

if someone on your team is intentionally throwing or afk, you should just be able to leave.  then we wouldn't have this problem of disparate punishments.

but no, everyone has to stay and be miserable, that doesn't create an unfun and frustrating gaming situation at all.
